projects.title: Twitter Search API Application
projects.description: A full-stack web application that allows the user to search for tweets either by user or by content. Built with a combination of technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, and React to create a seamless and user-friendly experience. The application also includes Twitter API integration, server-side routing, and dynamic front-end rendering that is stylized with Bootstrap.

projects.title: Add content and deploy!
projects.description: Get up and running within minutes. Just install the starter, add your content, deploy it, and there you go! This starter works seamlessly with hosts like Netlify. Photo by Cl√©ment H on Unsplash.

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
